snippet: The referee Craig Joubert wrongly awarded Australia a penalty that proved decisive in the team’s 35-34 Rugby World Cup quarterfinal victory over Scotland.
abstract: World Rugby announces penalty awarded to Australia in victory over Scotland in Rugby World Cup quarterfinals was error on part of referee.
lead_paragraph: The referee Craig Joubert wrongly awarded Australia a penalty that proved decisive in the team’s 35-34 Rugby World Cup quarterfinal victory over Scotland.

headline.main: Penalty at Rugby World Cup Is Called a Mistake
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Rugby; Penalty Is Called a Mistake
